t:
As soon as the wealthy looking man dropped his suitcase, I snatched it and ran away. I hid in a dark alley and opened the case, hoping for a fortune.


But all I found was a foul stench and a pile of bloody flesh.
c:
I was startled by a voice behind me, “Thank you for delivering my dinner.”



Background image made with Dall-E.


#crime #greed #twist #mystery #gore #irony #dark #macabre
